qrList.label: init
aiprocess
qrList.message:
/delay 100 |

/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq {: /abort :} |


/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} {: /abort :} |


/re-exec find=/(?<=prefill:\s+)[\S\s]+?(?=\(continue\|\s*```)/i {{lastMessage}} | /setvar key=extracted |
/getvar index=0 extracted | /setvar key=extracted | /getvar index=0 extracted |

/setinput {{pipe}}

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run PRESETNAME.userprocess |
/send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
/trigger || /setinput
